Text:
Why the hell should anybody choose to post a film with a 2.35:1 ratio?

This is a mayor screw up. Big black edges almost cutting of more then 50% on 4:3; 16:9 and even my 16:10 screen!

If it isnt 1.78:1 then don't post high definition video's.
Blast, now I have to re-burn.. I keep finding ficks of yours in better res. Some I allready burned in lower res..shooot.. happy any ways :) TNX a lot!
ow I am happy; I saw this once on tele and love it!
Thank you so much gopo!!! a/v=excellent!

Thank you kriss_kringle. The first commenter is a douche & does not know what he is talking about.

The correct Aspect Ratio (AR) is the AR that the Disk is originally in. If its 2.35 then that its. Thereafter while watchin if you get 2 black bars on your TV or monitor - be happy since you are watchin the film as it shoud be in its coreect AR. (BTW, black bars that are encoded in the rip itself suck & such rippers are stupid noobs)

Thanks for the up m8!
Good flick!
